doc_comment:
Returns the arc-tangent of y/x.

Special Cases:
- atan2(y, nan)     = nan
- atan2(nan, x)     = nan
- atan2(+0, x>=0)   = +0
- atan2(-0, x>=0)   = -0
- atan2(+0, x<=-0)  = +pi
- atan2(-0, x<=-0)  = -pi
- atan2(y>0, 0)     = +pi/2
- atan2(y<0, 0)     = -pi/2
- atan2(+inf, +inf) = +pi/4
- atan2(-inf, +inf) = -pi/4
- atan2(+inf, -inf) = 3pi/4
- atan2(-inf, -inf) = -3pi/4
- atan2(y, +inf)    = 0
- atan2(y>0, -inf)  = +pi
- atan2(y<0, -inf)  = -pi
- atan2(+inf, x)    = +pi/2
- atan2(-inf, x)    = -pi/2
pl: fn atan2(comptime T: type, y: T, x: T) T
